Class TidalPrediction

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.earth.oceanography.TidalPrediction
public class TidalPrediction extends Object
Tidal prediction using harmonic analysis.

  • Method Details

    • predictHeight

      public static double predictHeight(double meanSeaLevel, TidalPrediction.TidalConstituent[] constituents, double hoursFromEpoch)
      Predicts tide height at a given time using harmonic constituents. h(t) = h₀ + Σ Aᵢ cos(ωᵢt - φᵢ)
      Parameters:
      meanSeaLevel - h₀ (meters)
      constituents - Array of tidal constituents
      hoursFromEpoch - Time since reference epoch
      Returns:
      Predicted tide height (meters)

    • maxTidalRange

      public static double maxTidalRange(TidalPrediction.TidalConstituent[] constituents)
      Calculates tidal range (high - low) from constituents. Approximate as 2 * sum of amplitudes for max range.

    • simpleSemidiurnalModel

      public static TidalPrediction.TidalConstituent[] simpleSemidiurnalModel(double m2Amp, double m2Phase, double s2Amp, double s2Phase)
      Creates a simple M2+S2 tide model.

    • hoursToNextHighTide

      public static double hoursToNextHighTide(double currentHoursFromEpoch)
      Estimates time to next high tide (simple approximation).
